tasks.title: Implement Organizations Feature
tasks.description: Implement the core Organizations feature, including database schema, API endpoints, and UI components, optimized for iPad.

subtasks.title: Select Feature and Define Organizations Requirements
subtasks.description: Define the scope and requirements for the Organizations feature, including data model specifications, user roles, and feature boundaries.
subtasks.details: Create detailed specifications for organization structure (name, description, members, roles), define relationships with existing entities (contacts, deals), establish user permission levels, and document feature scope including what will and won't be included in initial implementation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review requirements with stakeholders and validate against existing CRM workflows

subtasks.title: Implement Database Layer for Organizations
subtasks.description: Create database schema, models, and migrations for the Organizations feature including all necessary tables and relationships.
subtasks.details: Design and implement organizations table with fields (id, name, description, created_at, updated_at), create organization_members junction table for user-organization relationships, add foreign key constraints, implement Core Data models for iOS, and create necessary indexes for performance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for model validation, migration tests, and database constraint verification

subtasks.title: Create API Endpoints for Organizations
subtasks.description: Develop RESTful API endpoints for all Organizations CRUD operations and related functionality.
subtasks.details: Implement endpoints for: GET /organizations (list with pagination), POST /organizations (create), GET /organizations/:id (detail), PUT /organizations/:id (update), DELETE /organizations/:id (delete), POST /organizations/:id/members (add member), DELETE /organizations/:id/members/:userId (remove member). Include proper authentication, authorization, input validation, and error handling.
subtasks.testStrategy: API integration tests covering all endpoints, authentication tests, and error scenario validation

subtasks.title: Build Core UI Components for Organizations
subtasks.description: Create the fundamental UI components for displaying and managing organizations, optimized for iPad interface.
subtasks.details: Develop OrganizationListView with master-detail layout for iPad, OrganizationDetailView with member management, OrganizationFormView for create/edit operations, and OrganizationMemberView for member display. Implement proper navigation flow, responsive design for iPad screen sizes, and accessibility features.
subtasks.testStrategy: UI unit tests for component rendering, interaction tests, and iPad-specific layout validation

subtasks.title: Implement Search and Filtering for Organizations
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive search and filtering capabilities to help users find and organize their organizations efficiently.
subtasks.details: Implement text search across organization names and descriptions, add filters for member count, creation date, and organization status. Create search bar component with real-time results, implement filter UI with multiple selection options, and add sorting capabilities (name, date, member count). Optimize search performance with proper indexing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Search functionality tests, filter combination tests, and performance tests with large datasets

subtasks.title: Add Settings Integration for Organizations
subtasks.description: Integrate Organizations feature with the app's settings system for user preferences and configuration options.
subtasks.details: Add organization-related settings to the main settings screen including default organization views, notification preferences for organization updates, member invitation settings, and data sync preferences. Implement settings persistence and validation, and ensure settings are properly applied throughout the Organizations feature.
subtasks.testStrategy: Settings integration tests, preference persistence validation, and user workflow testing

subtasks.title: Test iPad Compatibility and Responsiveness
subtasks.description: Thoroughly test the Organizations feature across different iPad models and orientations to ensure optimal user experience.
subtasks.details: Test on various iPad screen sizes (iPad mini, standard iPad, iPad Pro), verify landscape and portrait orientations, validate touch targets meet accessibility guidelines, test split-screen and multitasking scenarios, and ensure proper keyboard navigation support. Address any layout issues or performance problems specific to iPad hardware.
subtasks.testStrategy: Device-specific testing matrix, orientation change tests, accessibility compliance verification, and multitasking scenario validation

subtasks.title: Performance Optimization for Organizations
subtasks.description: Optimize the Organizations feature for smooth performance, especially when handling large datasets and complex operations.
subtasks.details: Implement lazy loading for organization lists, optimize database queries with proper indexing and query optimization, add caching for frequently accessed organization data, implement pagination for large member lists, and optimize image loading for organization logos. Profile memory usage and reduce any memory leaks.
subtasks.testStrategy: Performance benchmarking, memory profiling, large dataset testing, and load time measurement

subtasks.title: Integration Testing with Existing CRM Features
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive integration testing to ensure Organizations feature works seamlessly with existing CRM functionality.
subtasks.details: Test integration with Contacts (linking contacts to organizations), Deals (associating deals with organizations), Activities (organization-related activities), and Reports (organization-based reporting). Verify data consistency, proper relationship handling, and ensure no regressions in existing features. Test data migration scenarios if applicable.
subtasks.testStrategy: End-to-end integration tests, cross-feature workflow validation, data consistency checks, and regression testing suite

subtasks.title: Documentation Update for Organizations Feature
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the Organizations feature including user guides, API documentation, and developer resources.
subtasks.details: Update user documentation with Organizations feature usage instructions, create API documentation for all new endpoints, update developer guides with implementation details, create troubleshooting guides for common issues, and update app store descriptions and marketing materials to highlight the new Organizations capability.
subtasks.testStrategy: Documentation review process, user acceptance testing with documentation, and technical writing quality assurance
